fields.name: precedence
fields.label: Precedence
fields.description: The priority of the category in the navigation. Lower numbers are higher in the navigation.

fields.name: label
fields.label: Label
fields.description: The navigation label for the category

fields.name: isExternal
fields.label: External Link
fields.description: If true, the link will open in a new tab

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
